contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox station | name=Dobbs Ferry | style=MNRR Hudson | logo= | logo_size= | image=Dobbs Ferry train station.jpg | image_size=300px | image_caption=Southbound [[M7 (railcar)|M7A]] [[electric multiple unit|EMU]] train stopping at Dobbs Ferry | address=11 Station Plaza, between <br>High & Palisades Streets<br>[[Dobbs Ferry, NY]], 10522 | coordinates= {{Coord|41|00|45|N|73|52|46|W|format=dms|display=inline,title|type:landmark_region:US-NY}} | line={{rail color box|system=MNRR|line=Hudson}} | other={{bus icon|12px|Local Transit}} '''[[Bee-Line Bus System]]''': 1C, 1T, 1W, 6, 66 | platform=2 [[side platform]]s | tracks=4 | electrified= 700[[volt|V]] ([[Direct current|DC]]) [[third rail]] | parking=576 Spaces | bicycle= | passengers= | pass_year= | pass_percent= | opened= | rebuilt= | ADA= | code= | owned= | zone=4 | services= {{s-rail|title=MNRR}} {{s-line|system=MNRR|line=Hudson|next=Ardsley-on-Hudson|previous=Hastings-on-Hudson}} {{s-note|text=Former services}} {{s-rail-next|title=NYC}} {{s-line|system=NYC|line=Hudson Division|previous=Ardsley-on-Hudson|next=Hastings-on-Hudson}} }} The '''Dobbs Ferry''' [[Metro-North Railroad]] station serves residents of [[Dobbs Ferry, New York]] via the [[Hudson Line (Metro-North)|Hudson Line]]. Trains leave for [[New York City]] every 25 to 35 minutes on weekday rush-hour (peak trains). Trains run hourly during non-peak times, and on weekends and holidays. It is 19.9 miles from [[Grand Central Terminal]] and travel time to Grand Central is about 44 minutes by local train. ==Platforms and tracks== This station has two high-level [[side platform]]s each eight cars long. The west platform next to Track 4 is generally used by southbound trains. The east platform next to Track 3 is generally used by northbound trains. The Hudson Line has four tracks; the two inner tracks not next to either platform are used by express trains. Only one of the express tracks is powered. ==External links== {{commonscat-inline}} *[http://as0.mta.info/mnr/stations/station_detail.cfm?key=24 Metro-North Railroad - Dobbs Ferry] *[http://as0.mta.info/mnr/mstations/station_status_display.cfm?P_AVIS_ID=106 List of upcoming train departure times and track assignments from MTA] * [http://maps.google.com/?ie=UTF8&ll=41.012361,-73.879806&spn=0.003894,0.013679&z=17&layer=c&cbll=41.012361,-73.880002&panoid=xCDLvhHLMLDEG7PXKlMPhQ&cbp=12,100.28,,0,-2.76 Station House from Google Maps Street View] * [http://maps.google.com/?ie=UTF8&ll=41.013066,-73.87898&spn=0.003894,0.013679&z=17&layer=c&cbll=41.01314,-73.878891&panoid=mwef-BGH0zFOIXciW4CIdA&cbp=12,314.45,,0,-3.19 North entrance from Google Maps Street View] *{{YouTube|6D2R_xxzkNM|Metro-North M1&M7 at Dobbs Ferry sta.}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Dobbs Ferry (Metro-North Station)}} [[Category:Metro-North Railroad stations in New York]] [[Category:Stations along New York Central Railroad lines]] [[Category:Transportation in Westchester County, New York]] {{NewYork-railstation-stub}}
